Functions

double delay_prob (float alpha_day, float alpha_night, float beta1, float beta2, float beta3, float daylight_proportion, float velocity, float spill, int julian)
 new delay equation - daylight_proportion is portion of desired timestep spent in daylight; velocity in mi/day; spill is proportion of river spilled; julian is julian date; and the rest are dam dependent parameters.
double dam_delay_prob (struct river_segment *seg, equation *delay_eqn, int julian, int season_slice, int season_step)
 Probability of delay at a dam given the conditions.
